page.title: 17Dancing Clubs in Lostock
page.content:
There are a few clubs around Lostock mainly{dancing clubs and hobby clubs.
I go to the{dancing club at Lostock {Community Centre.}I go to the club because most of my friends go. There are{four classes}of dancing, two on {Saturday mornings 9.30am to 10.30am {and 10.30am to 11.30am. Also Tuesday {nights 6.00pm to 7.00pm and 7.00pm to {8.00pm.}Our teacher has three dancing schools one at Lostock, one at Westhoughton and one at Blackrod.
I go to the Saturday morning class from 10.30am to 11.30am and it is 70 pence. I also go to the Tuesday night class 6.00pm to 7.00pm. The Tuesday night class is for{team members only and I am a team member. The Saturday morning class is for anyone from starters to the most experienced.
